title: Resize and rebalance header brand/logo block

requirements.summary: Adjust header brand/logo typography and spacing to improve visibility across breakpoints while keeping header layout and brand click behavior intact.
acceptanceCriteria: On mobile and desktop, the header brand block on the left is visibly resized (larger or smaller as implemented) compared to the current `text-lg`/`text-xs` styling.
The header height, navigation alignment, and mobile menu button remain vertically centered and do not overlap the resized brand block.
Clicking/tapping the brand block still scrolls smoothly to `#home` and closes the mobile sheet if it is open.
No user-facing text is changed (brand still reads “ML Enterprise” and “Mokokchung”).

file_operations.description: Update the left-side brand button styles to use responsive font sizes (e.g., base vs sm/md), line-height, and controlled vertical gap so the brand is clearly visible without increasing header height or causing overlap. Ensure the brand button remains vertically centered within the existing `h-16` header row, and preserve the existing `scrollToSection('#home')` behavior (including closing the mobile Sheet). Since the header uses shadcn-ui Button/Sheet components, ensure the changes do not interfere with their layout/interaction; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
